resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105547</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105547</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206734</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">America's Library</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibliothek Amerikas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Bibliothèque de l'Amérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biblioteca De América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Libreria Dell'America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιβλιοθήκη της Αμερικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biblioteca De América</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">unlocks stories from America's past. Discover what Abraham Lincoln had in his pockets on the night he was assassinated, or jump back into the past to find more about the settlers who landed on Plymouth Rock. Or learn how the oud, the zurna, and the marimba influenced today's modern musical instruments.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">entsperrt Geschichten von Amerika hinter. 
Entdecken Sie, was Abraham Lincoln in seinen Taschen auf der 
Nacht hatte, die er ermordet wurde, oder springen Sie zurück in die 
Vergangenheit, um mehr über die Siedleren zu finden, die auf Plymouth
Felsen landeten. Oder erlernen Sie, wie das oud, das zurna und 
das marimba heutige moderne Musikinstrumente beeinflußten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déverrouille des histoires d'Amérique après. 
Découvrez ce qu'abraham Lincoln a eu dans des ses poches la 
nuit où il a été assassiné, ou branchez de nouveau dans le passé 
pour trouver plus au sujet des colons qui ont débarqué sur la roche 
de Plymouth. Ou apprenez comment l'oud, le zurna, et le marimba 
ont influencé les instruments musicaux modernes d'aujourd'hui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">destrava histórias de América após. 
Descubra o que Abraham Lincoln teve em seus bolsos na noite onde
assassinated, ou salte para trás no passado para encontrar mais sobre
os settlers que aterraram na rocha de Plymouth. Ou aprenda como 
o oud, o zurna, e o marimba influenciaram instrumentos musicais 
modernos de hoje.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sblocca le storia dall'America oltre. Scopra
che cosa Abraham Lincoln ha avuto in sue tasche sulla notte che è 
stato assassinato, o salti nuovamente dentro l'esperienza per trovare 
più circa i settlers che hanno atterrato sulla roccia di Plymouth. 
O impari come il oud, lo zurna ed il marimba hanno influenzato 
gli odierni strumenti musicali moderni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξεκλειδώνει τις ιστορίες από το παρελθόν της 
Αμερικής. Ανακαλύψτε τι ο Abraham Λίνκολν είχε στις 
τσέπες του στη νύχτα δολοφονήθηκε, ή άλμα πίσω στο παρελθόν για
να βρεί περισσότεροι για τους αποίκους που προσγειώθηκαν στο 
βράχο του Πλύμουθ. Ή μάθετε πώς το oud, το zurna, και
το marimba επηρέασαν τα σημερινά σύγχρονα μουσικά όργανα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">abre historias de América más allá de. 
Descubra lo que tenía Abraham Lincoln en sus bolsillos en la 
noche que lo asesinaron, o salte nuevamente dentro del pasado para 
encontrar más sobre los colonos que aterrizaron en la roca de 
Plymouth. O aprenda cómo el oud, el zurna, y el marimba 
influenciaron los instrumentos musicales modernos de hoy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206734</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105547</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/americas-library</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
